Move.description: A Heroic Move enables a Hero model to move before other models – defying the usual Priority system. The Hero can then Move, Jump, Climb, Charge and Stand Fast! A Hero model performing a Heroic Move may choose to shout “With Me!”. Any friendly models within 6" of that point may also move, so long as they end their move within 6" of the Hero (if they are not able to end within 6" of the Hero or choose not to move then they may not move at all this phase).

March.description: A Hero model who uses a Heroic March adds (depending on their troop keyword) 3" for Infantry or 5" for Cavalry / Fly to their maximum Move distance. Models who utilise a Heroic March may not Charge in the same Move phase. A Hero model who is conducting a Heroic March may choose to shout “At The Double!” to enable friendly models within 6" to also benefit from the Heroic March

Shoot.description: Heroic Shoot enables a Hero model to shoot before other models get a chance. A Hero cannot perform a Heroic Shoot if they are Engaged in combat. A Hero performing a Heroic Shoot may shout "Loose!" if they wish, enabling all friendly models within 6" to shoot with them.
